mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Western State School and Hospital Injury Notifications Letter

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A letter from Bob Nelkin to Dr. Ruth Scott, acting superintendent of Western State School and Hospital. Nelkin brings Dr. Scott's attention to the relevant section of the Bill of Rights for the Mentally Retarded and hopes WSSH adopts this statement as its policy.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: II. State School and Hospital (SSH) and Interim Care Committee Records 1972-1997
Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records, 1953-2000, MSS 1002 , Detre Library and Archives, Senator John Heinz History Center
